ProjectTitle: Characterization of novel regulators of the ethylene biosynthesis pathway in Arabidopsis.
InitialFeedbackHistory:
12/05/2022
4. Metadata: You don't mention any metadata, do your instruments generate any metadata with your images, sequencing or GC? 
7. Sharing: You mention that you aim to publish your data but also that you share upon request by mail. Have you considered any repositories, for example DRYAD (https://datadryad.org) or KU Leuven RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr)? F1000 research also gives good recommendations: https://f1000research.com/for-authors/data-guidelines. 
If you like to discuss whether there are any suitable metadata standards in your field or need help with the selection of a repository please contact onderzoek2bergen@kuleuven.be
label: good with suggestions
